Text: Hatton Castle stands on the lower part of Hatton Hill, the most easterly of the Sidlaw Hills, to the south of Newtyle in Angus, Scotland.
Triplets:<Hatton Castle
1:
--------------------
Text: Hatton Castle, Angus:  The castle overlooks the wooded Den of Newtyle, and its views extend across Strathmore and include Ben Lawers and Schiehallion as well as the Angus and Glenshee hills.
Triplets:<Hatton Castle
2:
--------------------
Text: Hatton Castle, Angus:  The 16th-century castle was originally built in a typical Scottish "Z plan" tower house design, as a fortified country house or "château".
Triplets:<Hatton Castle
